title: Oath Keepers
added: The leader of the Florida chapter of the Oath Keepers, on February 19, 2021 Meggs was charged with conspiracy for involvement in the storming of the Capitol.<ref>https://www.floridatoday.com/story/news/2021/03/12/titusville-man-arrested-over-capitol-riot-member-oath-keepers-militia-fbi/4667661001/</ref> Two days after Trump tweeted in December 2020 that the January 6 rally "will be wild," Meggs allegedly posted on Facebook, "Trump said It’s gonna be wild!!!!!!! It’s gonna be wild!!!!!!! He wants us to make it WILD that’s what he’s saying. He called us all to the Capitol and wants us to make it wild!!! Sir Yes Sir!!! Gentlemen we are heading to DC pack your shit!!” Meggs pleaded not guilty on March 13, 2021.<ref>https://lawandcrime.com/u-s-capitol-siege/oath-keepers-florida-chapter-leader-quoted-saying-trump-wants-us-to-make-it-wild-pleads-not-guilty-in-capitol-riot-case/</ref>

title: Oath Keepers
added: The leader of the Florida chapter of the Oath Keepers, on February 19, 2021 Meggs was charged with conspiracy for involvement in the storming of the Capitol.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.floridatoday.com/story/news/2021/03/12/titusville-man-arrested-over-capitol-riot-member-oath-keepers-militia-fbi/4667661001/|title=Titusville man arrested in connection with Capitol Riot a member of Oath Keepers militia: FBI|first=Alessandro Marazzi|last=Sassoon|website=Florida Today}}</ref> Two days after Trump tweeted in December 2020 that the January 6 rally "will be wild," Meggs allegedly posted on Facebook, "Trump said It’s gonna be wild!!!!!!! It’s gonna be wild!!!!!!! He wants us to make it WILD that’s what he’s saying. He called us all to the Capitol and wants us to make it wild!!! Sir Yes Sir!!! Gentlemen we are heading to DC pack your shit!!” Meggs pleaded not guilty on March 13, 2021.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://lawandcrime.com/u-s-capitol-siege/oath-keepers-florida-chapter-leader-quoted-saying-trump-wants-us-to-make-it-wild-pleads-not-guilty-in-capitol-riot-case/|title=Oath Keepers Florida Chapter Leader Quoted Saying Trump 'Wants Us to Make It Wild' Pleads Not Guilty in Capitol Riot Case|date=March 12, 2021}}</ref>
